_header: Sly men and egleche and of redes wise and bold
Subjects: Mary Magdalene, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Mary Magdalene according to some MSS of the South English Legendary

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Sleiȝe men and egleche and of redes wis and boldeLustines
                    nouþe to mi speche wise and vnwise ȝongue and olde…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…O fye Maudeleine þis is þe riȝhte endingueGod
                    us schilde fram peyne and to heouene us bringue
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 462-80.
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Sammlung altenglischer Legenden.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1878: 148-62.
Reames,  Sherry L.,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Legends
                of Women Saints.
         With the assistance of Martha G. Blalock and Wendy R. Larson.
            Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2003.

CamTCC605.First Lines:
HEyȝe men & redy wyse & of wordes boldelusteneþ
                    now to my speche boþ ȝonge & olde…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…of seint marie magdaleyn þus ys þe ryȝt
                    endynggod ous schulde fra helle pyne & to heuene ous bryng
CamTCC605.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu den Legenden.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         68 (1882): 52-73: (even pages 52-72).

Lam223.First Lines:
Slegh men of englissh of redes wise of wordes boldelistnes now to
                    my speche wise & vnwise ȝonge & olde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Saynt Marie Maudeleyn þis is þe riȝt
                    endingeGod vs shylde fro helle pyne & to heuen vs bringe
                    Amen
Lam223.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu den Legenden.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         68 (1882): 52-73: (odd pages 53-73).
